name: Dot 2 Dot Ultimate
description:
The classic kids game of connect the dots is now available for your device. Once all dots have been joined together a picture is revealed to show you what you have just outlined.

With multiple difficulty settings, it will keep the kids entertained no matter what their age. As they master the easier difficulty you can increase the difficulty and the number of dots required to join to make the image.

There are currently 4 themed image categories available (shapes, farm, numbers and alphabet) including over 45 unique images, and more exciting themes to come!

Features
• Connect the dots to reveal images
• 100% ad free
• Includes 4 themes with 49 images
• Multiple difficulty settings
